name: Convert Code
description: Convert code from one language to another
prompt:
Please convert the code in {{path}} from its current language to {{targetLanguage}}.

Requirements:
- Maintain the same functionality
- Use idiomatic patterns for the target language
- Preserve comments (translated if needed)
- Handle language-specific differences appropriately
- Add type annotations if the target language supports them

Save the converted code to a new file with the appropriate extension.

routing.useWhen: Use when asked to translate source code from one language to another while preserving behavior.
routing.dontUseWhen: Don't use when target language constraints, API semantics, or requirements are unclear.
routing.outputs: Converted source plus migration notes and any intentional semantic deviations.
routing.successCriteria: Core logic and behavior stay equivalent, with idiomatic target-language usage.
